item.description: Brad Manke signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Stevens County Sheriff's Office.

item.description: Rachel Haymon signed up to testify Pro.

item.title: Local law enforcement can't use dogs to find bad bears, wolves, cougars under new bill
item.description: News article "Local law enforcement can't use dogs to find bad bears, wolves, cougars under new bill" from MyNorthwest.
